content: each single_crochet around 8 single_crochet rd2 2sc in first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 times 12 single_crochet rd3 single_crochet in first 2 single_crochet 2sc in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2sc in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in last 2 single_crochet 16 single_crochet rd4 single_crochet in first 4 single_crochet 2sc in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2sc in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in last 4 single_crochet 20 single_crochet fasten_off with black 6 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet fasten_off finishing 1 sew on side fins to the sides of the whale 2 sew the pupils black onto the eyes white then sew the eyes on the sides of the head 3 using yarn needle and whatever mouth color you like embroider the mouth onto the whale 4 i also used a tiny amount of black yarn and embroidered a small x on the top
